job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Software Engineer - AI Cyber Defense
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Sr Software Engineer to join our Cyber Defense team focusing on the development of the next generation AI-powered security platform. This platform will be instrumental in enhancing our cyber defense capabilities across security operations, incident response, threat intelligence, and more. The security landscape is constantly evolving, and with the adoption of ML/GenAI backed by extensive heterogeneous data, security threats are inevitably broadened. With your deep and comprehensive expertise across major technology stacks, you will architect, implement and scale industry-leading security solutions for cyber defense. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies, collaborate with cross-functional security and engineering teams, and play a key role in shaping our cybersecurity strategy.

   What you will do

     * Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance platform and services for Uber's cyber defense
     * Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven
     * Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions
     * Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions
     * Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement, and mentor junior security engineers
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer - AI Cyber Defense

We are seeking a talented and experienced Sr Software Engineer to join our Cyber Defense team focusing on the development of the next generation AI-powered security platform. This platform will be instrumental in enhancing our cyber defense capabilities across security operations, incident response, threat intelligence, and more. The security landscape is constantly evolving, and with the adoption of ML/GenAI backed by extensive heterogeneous data, security threats are inevitably broadened. With your deep and comprehensive expertise across major technology stacks, you will architect, implement and scale industry-leading security solutions for cyber defense. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies, collaborate with cross-functional security and engineering teams, and play a key role in shaping our cybersecurity strategy.

   What you will do

     * Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance platform and services for Uber's cyber defense
     * Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven
     * Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions
     * Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions
     * Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement, and mentor junior security engineers

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the development of an AI-powered security platform, focusing on leveraging AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response. While it mentions 'AI-powered security platform' and 'ML/GenAI', the core responsibilities lean towards architecting, implementing, and scaling security solutions, transforming human-driven processes to AI-driven ones, and developing scalable platforms and services. This aligns more closely with the 'ML Engineer' profile's focus on building and deploying predictive models for specific tasks (like threat detection and response) and productionizing them within a larger system, rather than the 'GenAI Engineer's focus on generative models and user-facing applications built on top of them. The emphasis is on enhancing existing security operations through AI, which is a strong indicator of predictive modeling and automation rather than generative content creation or complex agent development.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance platform and services' directly relates to building and maintaining software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance platform and services

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response' indicates the application and development of AI models for specific security tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions' shows an ability to grasp business needs (cybersecurity) and convert them into technical plans.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions' implies the integration of AI capabilities into broader software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrases 'Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement' are standard software development practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'mentor junior security engineers' implies guiding and developing others, which often involves problem-solving and sharing expertise.
